info.name: about:performance compact
info.description: simplify and see more items in Firefox's about:performance page
info.additionalInfo:
• with this style, you no longer have to expand each item. framerate impact and CPU usage are always shown for all items. all other details are always hidden.
  • action buttons are hidden until you hover over an item
  • all web pages are shown always; no reason to limit to 3, since there is nothing below them
changelog: 2017-04-21: style buttons properly for default Firefox theme 2017-04-20: show all web pages always
